snippet.title: Poi: Explorer Edition - Official Nintendo Switch Trailer
snippet.description:
Available now at retail stores and on the Nintendo Switch eShop in North America! 

Releasing in Europe and other territories later this year!

Poi: Explorer Edition
http://www.poi-game.com/

Embark on a classic 3D platforming adventure as you set sail on an airship to collect Explorer Medallions and unravel the mysteries of the Milky Way Globe. Explore uncharted lands, and meet wild new characters, while on a journey to collect all the medallions and become a true Master Explorer!

Features:

-Explore magical worlds in search of 100+ Explorer Medallions
-Unlock special items and costumes fit for any explorer
-Compete to set the fastest times in global online leaderboards
-Master classic platforming moves like wall jumps, triple jumps, long jumps and more
-Soundtrack composed by Lyndon Holland

Nintendo Switch Exclusive Features:

-Extended Storyline
-More challenging boss battles
-Unlockable Soundtrack and Digital Art Book
-New costumes and hats only available within the “Explorer Edition”
-Joy-Con motion control support

Developed by PolyKid Games
http://www.polykidgames.com/
https://twitter.com/polykidgames

Published by Alliance Digital Media
http://alliancedigitalmedia.com/
https://twitter.com/wemakegames
https://www.facebook.com/AllianceDigitalMedia/
